alert.note: Alert for Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:53PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARDING... NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Mosquero to 15 miles west of Nara Visa. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Amistad, Bueyeros, Hayden, and Rosebud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern and east central New Mexico.
